version_description:
- Search by Hotel Name: directly search your favorite hotel from our hotel homepage
- Search by District: You are also able to search hotels in particular area of city directly
- Reviewer Groups: Hotel reviews are categories based on traveler's type that makes it much easier for you to find the best hotel suiting your needs
- Additional Sorting & Filter: Sort by distance to city center/airport and filter by review traveler's type

- Added flight sort and filter by flight experience and filter by origin/destination airports
- Added swap button on flight search form for you to switch departure and arrival quickly
- Get hotel deals for you and highlight the deals in hotel results page
- iOS 11 supported and iOS Password autofill supported
- Bug fixes and performance improvements
- Bug fixes and performance improvements

- Present hotel rates grouping by hotel room types
- Improve code architecture to ensure App's better performance
- Compatible with iPhone X
- Bug fixing for our faster booking flow

- تدريج تقيبم الفنادق بحسب انواع الغرف
- تطوير برمجة الكود للتأكد من أداء أكثر نجاعة للتطبيق
- دعم وملاءمة لجهاز ايفون x
- معالجة أي خلل لإتاحة حجز أسرع

- Bug fixing and performance enhancements

- إصلاح الأعطال وتحسين الأداء

- New customer support page allowing you send us email in App
- Add live chat tool for you to directly contact our customer supports online
- Phone call services are also provided - call our supports directly!
- Bug fixes and performance improvements

-تحديث صفحة خدمة العملاء حيث يمكنك الآن إرسال إيميل من التطبيق
-إضافة ميزة التحدث مباشرة مع خدمة العملاء عبر الانترنت.
-خدمات الاتصال بالهاتف متوفرة أيضاً حيث يمكنك الاتصال مباشرة بخدمة العملاء
-إصلاح الأعطال وتحسين الأداء

Presenting ‘Multi-City Flight Search’ - one of the most requested features is now LIVE on Wego. Find the best price for flights to multiple destinations, quickly and easily. Book multiple flights in one go, and see the total fare upfront. Download the update and try out ‘Multi-City Flight Search’ feature right now!

بناء على اقتراحاتكم يسعدنا أن نعلمكم بأن ميزة " الوجهات المتعددة" أصبحت متاحة الآن على ويجو. ابحث عن أفضل الأسعار لرحلات الوجهات المتعددة بسهولة وبسرعة الآن وشاهد السعر الإجمالي لرحلتك. الرجاء تحديث التطبيق لتجرب ميزة "الوجهات المتعددة" الآن.
- Bug fixes and performance improvements

Book multiple flights in one go, and see the total fare upfront. Download the update and try out ‘Multi-City Flight Search’ feature right now!

بناء على اقتراحاتكم يسعدنا أن نعلمكم بأن ميزة " الوجهات المتعددة" أصبحت متاحة الآن على ويجو. ابحث عن أفضل الأسعار لرحلات الوجهات المتعددة بسهولة وبسرعة الآن وشاهد السعر الإجمالي لرحلتك. الرجاء تحديث التطبيق لتجرب ميزة "الوجهات المتعددة" الآن.

- Launched 6 more countries - find out your country in the settings
- Added hotel deal filter & sort to help you looking for hotels with deals only
- Supported multiple languages when searching by hotel name on results list
- Hotels search for group & family, inputting Children's ages to get lower hotel price for Children
- Presenting hotels base price & total price for you
- Redesigned flight and hotel rates page, compare rates easily

- إضافة 6 دول أخرى إلى التطبيق - ابحث عن بلدك في إعدادات التطبيق
- إضافة فلتر وترتيب لعروض الفنادق لمساعدتك في البحث عن الفنادق التي تقدم عروض فقط
-يمكنك الآن البحث عن اسم الفندق في نتائج البحث باستخدام عدة لغات
- إتاحة البحث عن الفنادق لمجموعات مسافرين، مع تحديد سنّ كلّ طفل؛ للحصول على عروض أرخصّ وأدقّ.
- عرض أكثر تفصيلًا لأسعار الفنادق؛ يشمل سعر الليلة الواحدة والسعر الإجماليّ.
- إعادة تصميم طريقة عرض أسعار الفنادق؛ لمقارنة أكثر سهولة بين مختلف العروض.

- إصلاح الأعطال وتحسينات في الأداء

- Redesign the properties detail listing page. Easy check out properties' rates, reviews, images and prices all at one scrollable page. Support to view properties' image in a full image mode.

- Integrate Airbnb homes with our hotel metasearch. You can compare the destination hotels and homes at the same time with a single search.

Try out all these great new features. Keep "Wego" your flights & Hotels. Love our app? Rate us.


- محرك البحث عن الفنادق بات يحتوي على بيوت Airbnb. من الآن فصاعدا بإمكانك المقارنة بين الفنادق والبيوت في مختلف الوجهات في نفس عملية البحث.
- تصميم جديد لصفحة تفاصيل العقارات. بحث أسهل عن مختلف مزايا الفندق: التصنيف، تقييمات النزلاء، الصور والأسعار، كلّ ذلك في صفحة خاصّة بوضعيّة الصورة الكاملة.

- لا تفوت تجربة جميع المزايا الجديدة الرائعة، واحرص على جعل "ويجو" عنوانك للبحث عن أفضل الفنادق ورحلات الطيران. هل أحببت التطبيق؟ اترك لنا تقييمك.

- Integrate Airbnb homes with our hotel metasearch. You can compare the destination hotels and homes at the same time with a single search.

- Redesign the properties detail listing page. Easy check out properties' rates, reviews, images and prices all at one scrollable page. Support to view properties' image in a full image mode. Try out all these great new features. Keep "Wego" your flights & Hotels. Love our app? Rate us.

- Bug fixes and performance improvements

-إصلاح الأعطال وتحسين الأداء

- App fully optimised for iOS 12
- Supported Siri Shortcuts which is capable of quick actions to search hotel tonight and access Wego exclusive deals etc.


- ملاءمة التطبيق كاملًا ليصبح داعما لأجهزة iOS12
- تزويد Siri بمجموعة من عمليات البحث السريع عن الفنادق، ايجاد فندق لهذه الليلة، عروض حصريّة والمزيد غيرها

- Easily recognise different types of properties in hotel search results
- New hotel card UI providing you with a snippet of the review and price information
- Optimise hotel and flight filters order; made them collapsable and easy to find
- Present hotel users reviews from partners; more references before booking hotels
- App fully optimised for iOS 12
- Supported Siri Shortcuts which is capable of quick actions to search hotel tonight and access Wego exclusive deals etc.
Get the perfect hotel stay with Wego’s new hotel features

- تسهيل عرض أنواع خيارات المبيت في نتائج البحث عن الفنادق
- لوائح متكاملة جديدة لتفاصيل الفنادق وأسعارها
-تطوير فلتر الفنادق ورحلات الطيران وإعادة ترتيبه، بحيث يمكنك تكبير وتصغير مساحة عرض الخيارات فيه وبذلك تجد ما يهمك بسهولة أكبر
- عرض تقييمات مستخدمي الفنادق مباشرة من شركائنا، لتحصل على تقييمات من مصادر أكثر قبل حجز الفندق
- ملاءمة التطبيق كاملًا ليصبح داعما لأجهزة iOS12
- تزويد Siri بمجموعة من عمليات البحث السريع عن الفنادق، ايجاد فندق لهذه الليلة، عروض حصريّة والمزيد غيرها
احصل على تجربة مبيت مثاليّة مع مزايا ويجو الجديدة

- Bugs fixing/optimisation

- تحسينات عامة واصلاح بعض الأخطاء
- Bug fixes and performance improvements

- Brand new feature - Stories! We’ve worked hard to bring you the best travel articles & inspirations right within your Wego App! Browse new & exciting travel stories everyday.
- Hindi users rejoice! We’ve fully localised the Wego app for Hindi - the 4th most spoken language in the world.

We’ve reimagined our app from the ground up. Wego now has a completely refreshed aesthetic, alongside exciting new features. Looking for travel inspiration? Check out our new “Explore” tab for ideas to travel anywhere in the world.

- Integrated with ‘The Entertainer’ to bring more offers such as foods&beverages , leisure attractions, beauty&wellness to you.- Wego Insiders’s club is now renamed as Wego Offers and it is now accessible to all users- Download the app now to enjoy Wego Offers!

- Added hotel exclusive deals for you. Enjoy mobile special rates and 10% off from selective providers.
- App optimisation

- إضافة عروض حصرية على الفنادق من أجلك. استمتع بخصم 10% على مجموعة مختارة من مزوّدي الخدمة.
- تطوير التطبيق.

We've added similar hotel suggestions when viewing a hotel's details page. Enjoy the new update!

مجموعة جديدة من الفنادق المشابهة المقترحة تمت إضافتها بينما تتصفح تفاصيل الفندق. اطلع عليها واستمتع بالتحديث الأخير!

- Integrated with ‘The Entertainer’ to bring more offers such as foods&beverages , leisure attractions, beauty&wellness to you.
- Wego Insiders’s club is now renamed as Wego Offers and it is now accessible to all users
- Download the app now to enjoy Wego Offers!

New year, new look! We’ve reimagined our app from the ground up.
Wego now has a completely refreshed aesthetic, alongside exciting new features.
Looking for travel inspiration? Check out our new “Explore” tab for ideas to travel anywhere in the world.

We’ve reimagined our app from the ground up. Wego now has a completely refreshed aesthetic, alongside exciting new features. Looking for travel inspiration? Check out our new “Explore” tab for ideas to travel anywhere in the world.
- Bug fixes and performance improvements

- Brand new feature - Stories! We’ve worked hard to bring you the best travel articles & inspirations right within your Wego App! Browse new & exciting travel stories everyday.
- Hindi users rejoice! We’ve fully localised the Wego app for Hindi - the 4th most spoken language in the world.

- Brand new feature - Stories! We’ve worked hard to bring you the best travel articles & inspirations right within your Wego App! Browse new & exciting travel stories everyday.

- Wego App dark mode is available on iOS 13 now. Turn on dark mode by swiping into the control center on your phone to enjoy the cool interface.
- Support sign in with Apple on iOS 13
- Bug fixes to fully compatible with iOS 13
- Bug fixes and performance improvements
Improved live chat experience. Feel free to reach to our customer support team if you have any feedback.
Bug fixes and performance optimization

Improved home page performance for better user experience
Bug fixes and performance improvements
We have shortlisted Featured Destinations for you - be ready to explore
We have added and will keep updating COVID-19 related travel advisories & restrictions that you must know before your flight's booking

COVID-19 Travel Advisory
We have added COVID-19 related features for travellers in the form of travel advisories and restrictions that appear on the homepage and flight search results. These travel advisories are regularly updated and essential information for anyone who's booking their flights during this period.

Iftar Timings & Qibla Finder
First-ever ‘Muslim Prayer Times & Qibla Finder’ feature in a travel app, designed specially for our Muslim users as they prepare to observe the holy month of Ramadan. Users in Malaysia, Indonesia, and the MENA region will see a ‘Muslim Prayer Times’ widget in their newly updated app.

Public Holidays Calendar
Plan your travel on public holidays easily with our new Public Holidays Calendar feature. You’ll find helpful cards on the homepage that shows public holidays in the upcoming months, so you can book your trip in advance and save money.

COVID-19 Travel Advisory
We have added COVID-19 related features for travellers in the form of travel advisories and restrictions that appear on the homepage and flight search results. These travel advisories are regularly updated and essential information for anyone who's booking their flights during this period.

Iftar Timings & Qibla Finder
First-ever ‘Muslim Prayer Times & Qibla Finder’ feature in a travel app, designed specially for our Muslim users as they prepare to observe the holy month of Ramadan. Users in Malaysia, Indonesia, and the MENA region will see a ‘Muslim Prayer Times’ widget in their newly updated app.

Public Holidays Calendar
Plan your travel on public holidays easily with our new Public Holidays Calendar feature. You’ll find helpful cards on the homepage that shows public holidays in the upcoming months, so you can book your trip in advance and save money.

Hey there Traveler! We’re working hard (from home) to bring you new features!
In this update, we’ve added:

Travel News
Stay on top of all the latest happenings in the travel space and when your favorite destinations are set to reopen!

Collections
Explore our hand-picked collections from Themed Getaways to Hidden Gems waiting to be found, with more being added every week!

This update also fixes several bugs and improves performance on some devices.
We’ve got a lot of new features planned for you travelers itching to get back out into the world! Stay tuned, and stay safe!
